item.title: Self Cauterization
item.description: NOTES: Something I wrote myself. See the blog post here. Self Cauterization None of us knew how it happened. None of us knew where they got all of the firepower that they had. Yet place by place, we were pushed back. Back further than our original homes, and all we knew was becoming further and further away every day. We couldn’t keep the lights on, we didn’t have the Great Zapfish anymore.

item.title: Frozen Welcomes
item.description: NOTES: Something I wrote myself. See the blog post here. Frozen Welcomes I didn’t even know what time it was. All I know was that it was far later at night than I was used to. Through the only window in the broken down room, the first flecks of snow started to fall. Finally, winter truly started… though it’s not as if I could enjoy any of it, I was grounded.
